gaffer.jsonserialisation

Class JSONSerialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.jsonserialisation.JSONSerialiser

  • public class JSONSerialiser
extends Object
    A JSONSerialiser provides the ability to serialise and deserialise to/from JSON. The serialisation is set to not include nulls or default values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSONSerialiser()
      Constructs a JSONSerialiser that skips nulls and default values.
      JSONSerialiser(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
      Constructs a JSONSerialiser with a custom ObjectMapper.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONSerialiser

        public JSONSerialiser()
        Constructs a JSONSerialiser that skips nulls and default values.

      • JSONSerialiser

        public JSONSerialiser(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)
        Constructs a JSONSerialiser with a custom ObjectMapper. To create the custom ObjectMapper it is advised that you start with the default mapper provided from JSONSerialiser.createDefaultMapper() then add your custom configuration.
        Parameters:
        mapper - a custom object mapper

                        boolean prettyPrint)
                 throws SerialisationException
        Serialises an object.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to be serialised

        Returns:
        the provided object serialised (with pretty printing) into bytes

        Serialises an object using the provided json generator.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to be serialised and written to file
        jsonGenerator - the JsonGenerator to use to write the object to
        prettyPrint - true if the object should be serialised with pretty printing
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - if the object fails to serialise
